cleaned_text: How Acupuncture & Fire Cupping Can Boost Immunity By: Sophie Wingert, Holistic Practitioner [Acupuncture and fire cupping](https://www.saffronsageliving.com/immunity) are two ancient healing practices that have been used for centuries to help boost immunity and overall health. Fire cupping is a therapeutic practice that involves using a heated cup to create suction on the skin to help release toxins and promote circulation. Both of these practices can help to strengthen the immune system and improve overall health. [Acupuncture](https://www.saffronsageliving.com/immunity) works by stimulating the body's energy pathways, or meridians. This stimulation helps to balance the flow of energy throughout the body and promote healing. Studies have shown that acupuncture can help to reduce inflammation and boost immune system function. Acupuncture may also help to reduce stress levels, which can have a positive effect on overall health and immunity.
